subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Bryce Drew, who hit a game-winning 3-pointer as Valparaiso made it to the Round of 16 in the 1998 N.C.A.A. tournament, leads the Crusaders against Michigan State on Thursday.
snippet: Bryce Drew, who hit a game-winning 3-pointer as Valparaiso made it to the Round of 16 in the 1998 N.C.A.A. tournament, leads the Crusaders against Michigan State on Thursday.
